net.uniform.api.html

Class OptionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.uniform.api.html.OptionGroup

  • public class OptionGroup
extends Object

    An option group represents a group of options of an element that can contain options, such as a Select or a Radio. Option values cannot be repeated in the option group.

    An option group holds:
    • An id, unique in the element
    • A user friendly text
    • Enabled state

    An option group with null id and text is considered as the default group of the element

    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos

      • hasValueEnabled

        public boolean hasValueEnabled(String value)
        Indicates if the group has an option with the given value, which is also enabled. This group must also be enabled.
        Parameters:
        value - Option value to check
        Returns:
        True if the option for the value exists, it's enabled and this group is enabled

      • getOption

        public Option getOption(String value)
        Returns the option in this group with the given value, if present.
        Parameters:
        value - Option value
        Returns:
        Option or null

      • getOptions

        public List<Option> getOptions(boolean includeDisabled)
        Returns all the options in this group, in list order.
        Parameters:
        includeDisabled - Indicates if disabled options should be included in the list. If the group itself is disabled, its options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        List of options

      • getOptions

        public List<Option> getOptions()
        Returns all the options in this group, in list order.
        Returns:
        List of options

      • getEnabledOptions

        public List<Option> getEnabledOptions()
        Returns the options in this group that are not disabled, in list order. If the group itself is disabled, options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        List of enabled options

      • getOptionValues

        public Set<String> getOptionValues()
        Returns all the values of the options of this group
        Returns:
        Set of values

      • getEnabledOptionValues

        public Set<String> getEnabledOptionValues()
        Returns all the values of the options of this group that are enabled. If the group itself is disabled, its options are also considered as disabled.
        Returns:
        Set of values of enabled options

        public OptionGroup clearOptions()

        This group

        public boolean hasOptions()
        Indicates if the group has any option.
